description.en: Geojam is a social engagement platform that generates meaningful and passion-fueled engagement between fans and creators. Geojam's token, $JAM, is paving the next generation of the creator economy at the intersection of Web3, social media, and DeFi to ignite an economy where artists, creators, and fans can earn together and generate value for experiencing moments together. Whether it's being featured on a billboard with Machine Gun Kelly or flying on a private jet with 24kGoldn, Geojam is home to incredible once-in-a-lifetime experiences for fans. Creating unique and impactful interaction between music artists and fans is what positions Geojam as the go-to social media app for music.
